high_descs: Turn around and then right to find the brown dresser.
Pick up the pencil from on top of the brown dresser.
Carry the pencil and turn around and then left to the large desk.
Hold the pencil and turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Hold a pencil and turn on the lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the table then turn right and walk to the dresser.
Pick up the pencil that's in front of you.
Turn around and walk a step past the bed then turn left and walk to the night stand to the right of the bed.
Turn on the light that's near the laptop.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a pencil in lamp light.

high_descs: Turn around and go right to face the dresser at the end of the bed with the clock on it.
Pick the pencil up from the dresser.
Turn around and go left to face the desk.
Turn the lamp on the desk on.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pencil and turn a lamp on.
